TitleEnglish: The Tunnel to Summer, the Exit of Goodbyes
SummaryEnglish: Kaoru Tono heard a rumor: The laws of space and time mean nothing to the Urashima Tunnel. If you find it, walk through and you'll find your heart's desire on the other side...in exchange for years of your own life.
Aliases: Natsu e no Tonneru, Sayonara no Deguchi
Natsu e no tunnel, Sayonara no deguchi
